author: publisher2
title: CFTRI Recruitment 2017 – JRF & PA Posts

organizations.name: junior research fellow/ project assistant & project assistant
biochemistry/ biotechnology/ molecular biology/ life sciences

text: Click here for Project Assistants Level -II Post Details CFTRI Recruitment 2017 – JRF & PA Posts: CSIR – Central Food Technological Research (CFTRI) has published notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow, Junior Research Fellow/ Project Assistant & Project Assistant (Level-II) vacancies for the various projects on temporary & contract basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 21 & 24-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. CFTRI Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 04 Name of the Post: 1. Junior Research Fellow: 01 Post 2. Junior Research Fellow/ Project Assistant Level II: 01 Post 3. Project Assistant (Level-II): 01 Post 4. Junior Research Fellow: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be 28 years for Junior Research Fellow and Post No. 03 & 30 years for Project Assistant Level II as on last date for receipt of application. Age relaxation is applicable to SC/ ST/ OBC and women candidates as per Government of India rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess First class M.Tech or B.Tech in Biotechnology/ Biochemical Engineering/ Chemical Engineering/ Technology and should have qualified GATE or equivalent exam with good academic records for Post No. 01, First class M.Sc/ M.Tech in Biochemistry/ Biotechnology/ Molecular Biology/ Life Sciences or equivalent degree with good academic records for Post No. 03, First class M.Tech in Biotechnology/ Biochemical Engineering/ Technology with good academic records or First class B.Tech in Biotechnology/ Biochemical Engineering/ Chemical Engineering/ Technology should have qualified GATE or equivalent exam with good academic records or Post Graduation in Basic Science with NET qualification for Post No. 04. For more qualification details refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their complete Bio-data with e-mail address/contact phone number along with attested copies of the necessary certificates in support of date of birth, caste, qualification/experience etc to the relevant address (Refer the notification) on or before 21 & 24-03-2017. Important Dates: Last Date for Receipt of Application for Post No. 01 & 02: 21-03-2017 Last Date for Receipt of Application for Post No. 03 & 04: 24-03-2017 For more details like emolument, experience, terms, conditions & other information click on the link given below…. CFTRI Recruitment 2017
